attributes.action: Stop the Integration of the British Armed Forces into the EU Armed Forces.
attributes.additional_details:
Martial Law. 
The EU Army has been deployed against the population of France
It has integrated Ukraine using its Nazi Army alongside German units against the German population.

Using an Army  against an unarmed defenceless domestic population is a breach of Human Rights & a Crime Against Humanity.

To integrate the British Army into this EU Army without Parliament approval is a breach of the British Constitution & subsequently a declaration of war on the population of the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: That the UK Armed Forces or ancilliaries will not be subject to agreement or contract, deployed, integrated or under the control of another State without the full consent of the UK Parliament
